T02D1513b:357b-42: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02D1513b:357b-43: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D1513b:357b-44: rgyal bas byang chub mchog tu bzhed //
T02D1513b:357b-45: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis bdag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D1513b:357b-46: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa'i mchog tu grub par byed //
T02D1513b:357b-47: aom shr'i he ru ka aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02D1513b:357b-48: aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha mi ti shtha badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes bya bas byin la /
T02D1513b:357b-49: dpal ldan rdo rje don yod 'chang //
T02D1513b:358a-2: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D1513b:358a-3: rdo rje las su mdzad du gsol //

T02D1513b:358a-5: 'du byed phung po rnam dag pa'i //
T02D1513b:358a-6: bya ba nan tan ye shes kyi //
T02D1513b:358a-7: phrag dog don yong grub pa yi //
T02D1513b:358a-8: dril bu yis ni dbang bskur ro ;
T02D1513b:358a-9: / de nas me tog gi phreng ba bzung la ming gi dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D1513b:358a-10: lugs ma'i sku spyi bor bzhag la aom las 'khor lo /
T02D1513b:358a-11: de las rnam par snang mdzad de yongs su gyur pa las dbu'i gtsug tor du bsams la /
T02D1513b:358a-12: phreng ba spyi bor bcings te /
T02D1513b:358a-13: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02D1513b:358a-14: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02D1513b:358a-15: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D1513b:358a-16: he ru ka dpal dag tu bskyed //
T02D1513b:358a-17: aom shr'i he ru ka aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02D1513b:358a-18: shr'i he ru ka che ge mo n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02D1513b:358a-19: dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba //
T02D1513b:358a-20: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1513b:358a-21: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D1513b:358a-22: rdo rje skur ni mdzad du gsol //
T02D1513b:358a-23: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1513b:358a-24: gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag pas //
T02D1513b:358a-25: chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag pa'i //
T02D1513b:358a-26: gti mug rnam par snang mdzad kyi //
T02D1513b:358a-27: dpal ldan ming gi dbang bskur ro //
T02D1513b:358a-28: de nas mi tog gtor byas nas //
T02D1513b:358a-29: phung po lnga ni rnam dag cing //
T02D1513b:358a-30: nyon mongs lnga ni spangs pas na //
T02D1513b:358a-31: ma rig pa ni rnam dag pas //
T02D1513b:358a-32: rig pa yi ni dbang zhes bshad //
T02D1513b:358a-34: de nas brtul zhugs mang po sbyin par bya ste rdo rje dril bu byin la /
T02D1513b:358a-35: padma ltar skor ba'i phyag rgyas lan gsum bskor la /
T02D1513b:358a-36: rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol du bcug la /
T02D1513b:358a-37: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1513b:358a-38: he ru ka dpal phyag na bsnams //
T02D1513b:358a-39: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D1513b:358a-40: he ru ka dpal brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D1513b:358a-41: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha stvam dha ra y'a mi /
T02D1513b:358a-42: h'um ha ha ha ha ho zhes bya bas rdo rje brtul zhugs so //
T02D1513b:358a-43: de nas phyag mtshan bcu gnyis lugs ma 'am 'bur
T02D1513b:358a-44: du brkos pa'am ri mor bris ba h'um mdzad kyi
T02D1513b:358a-45: sngags kyi bsangs nas slob ma la sbyin par bya
T02D1513b:358a-46: ste / rdo rje dril bu bcangs pa yi //
T02D1513b:358a-47: shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang //
T02D1513b:358a-48: bzod pa glang po'i pags pa dang //
T02D1513b:358a-49: smon lam cang te'u bsnams pa dang //
T02D1513b:358b-0: ye shes gri gug nyon @358b mongs gcod //
T02D1513b:358b-1: dgra sta tshul khrims rnam dag dang //
T02D1513b:358b-2: rtse gsum sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin //
T02D1513b:358b-3: thod pa thabs la mkhas pa dang //
T02D1513b:358b-4: brtson 'grus rdo rje zhags pa dang //
T02D1513b:358b-5: kha tv'am bsam gtan rnam dag ste //
T02D1513b:358b-6: tshangs pa'i mgo bo stobs su bshad //
T02D1513b:358b-7: pha rol phyin pa rnam dag pas //
T02D1513b:358b-8: bu khyod kyis ni bcang bar bya //
T02D1513b:358b-9: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat re re zhing bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1513b:358b-10: de nas me tog gtor nas /
T02D1513b:358b-11: dpa' bo chen po'i brtul zhugs bzang //
T02D1513b:358b-12: rten 'brel bcu gnyis rnam dag pa //
T02D1513b:358b-13: pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams kyi //
T02D1513b:358b-14: phyag rgya yis ni dbang bskur ro //
T02D1513b:358b-18: // / sangs rgyas kun gyi mig 'byed pa'i //
T02D1513b:358b-19: gsang sngags bla na med pa yi //
T02D1513b:358b-20: snying po yid bzhin nor bu 'di //
T02D1513b:358b-21: skyob pa'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur ro //
T02D1513b:358b-22: de nas me tog gtor la sngags bzla pa'i phyir bzlas pa'i phreng ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1513b:358b-23: deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1513b:358b-24: rnal 'byor ma dang rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1513b:358b-25: shes rab thabs kyi bsnyems chen gyis //
T02D1513b:358b-26: gar mchog bde ba dga' ston gyis //
T02D1513b:358b-27: sgeg dang bcas pa'i me tog phreng //
T02D1513b:358b-28: sangs rgyas kun sogs rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1513b:358b-29: des ni bral bar mi 'gyur te //
T02D1513b:358b-30: me tog phreng bas brgyan gyur cig / phreng ba'o //
T02D1513b:358b-31: lus can kun gyi dam chos kyi //
T02D1513b:358b-32: khyod kyis glu ni blangs byas te //
T02D1513b:358b-33: des na rnal 'byor ma de dang //
T02D1513b:358b-34: myur du bde ba myong bar 'gyur //
T02D1513b:358b-36: khyod kyis rgyal la dri phul bas //
T02D1513b:358b-37: tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang //
T02D1513b:358b-38: rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yi //
T02D1513b:358b-39: lus can byang chub thob gyur cig / dri'o//
T02D1513b:358b-40: rdzogs sangs rgyas la sbos phul bas //
T02D1513b:358b-41: brtul zhugs bzang pos legs tshim zhing //
T02D1513b:358b-42: lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su //
T02D1513b:358b-43: ye shes kyis ni tshim gyur cig / spos so //
T02D1513b:358b-44: chos kyi mar me legs sbar bas //
T02D1513b:358b-45: padma gar dbang bdag nyid de //
T02D1513b:358b-46: sems can ma rig mdongs byas la //
T02D1513b:358b-47: ye shes sgron ma snang gyur cig / mar me'o //
T02D1513b:358b-49: de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D1513b:358b-50: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02D1513b:358b-51: ji ltar mchod sbyin gsol ba gdab / bdag kyang bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir//
T02D1513b:359a-0: @359a * // nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la gsol //
T02D1513b:359a-1: he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba //
T02D1513b:359a-2: 'gro ba skyob pa'i gzi brjid can //
T02D1513b:359a-3: ji ltar yon tan 'byung gnas stsol //
T02D1513b:359a-4: de bzhin bdag la deng bdag stsol //
T02D1513b:359a-5: dba' bo chen po mi ldog pa'i //
T02D1513b:359a-6: dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol //
T02D1513b:359a-7: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D1513b:359a-8: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur //
T02D1513b:359a-9: de ltar gsol ba btab pa'i rjes la sdom pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1513b:359a-10: ji bzhin don ldan bcu bzhi ni //
T02D1513b:359a-11: phas pham par ni rab tu grags //
T02D1513b:359a-12: sbong zhing dor bar mi bya ste //
T02D1513b:359a-13: rtsa ba'i lhung bar shes par bya //
T02D1513b:359a-14: slob dpon la ni brnyas pa dang //
T02D1513b:359a-15: bde gshegs bka' ni gcog pa dang //
T02D1513b:359a-16: sdang bas spun la bsngags mi bya //
T02D1513b:359a-17: byams pa chen po spong bar byed //
T02D1513b:359a-18: byang chub sems ni 'dor bar byed //
T02D1513b:359a-19: shes pa gsum la smod pa dang //
T02D1513b:359a-20: skal min gsang bsgrogs pa dang //
T02D1513b:359a-21: rgyal ba'i bdag nyid phung po smod //
T02D1513b:359a-22: dag pa'i chos la yid gnyis dang //
T02D1513b:359a-23: gdug la byams dang chags bral dang //
T02D1513b:359a-24: chos la gnyis su 'byed pa dang //
T02D1513b:359a-25: dad pa'i sems ni rab tu smod //
T02D1513b:359a-26: dam tshig bsten tshe ji snyed tshe //
T02D1513b:359a-27: rtag pa'i bud med smod pa ste //
T02D1513b:359a-28: rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1513b:359a-29: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02D1513b:359a-30: nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya //
T02D1513b:359a-31: sngags pas 'di dag byed pa ni //
T02D1513b:359a-33: yan lag dam tshig shes par bya //
T02D1513b:359a-34: dam tshig mi ldan snod min pa'i //
T02D1513b:359a-35: rig ma bsten par bya ba dang //
T02D1513b:359a-36: tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa dang //
T02D1513b:359a-37: gsang ba'i chos ni ston pa dang //
T02D1513b:359a-38: sems can dang dang ldan pa la //
T02D1513b:359a-39: dam chos gzhan du ston pa dang//
T02D1513b:359a-40: nyan thos dag tu slob byed pa'i //
T02D1513b:359a-41: nang du zhag bdun gnas pa dang //
T02D1513b:359a-42: sbyor ba nges par ma byas pa'i //
T02D1513b:359a-43: snod min gsang ba ston pa yi //
T02D1513b:359a-44: kha na ma tho sbom 'gyur te //
T02D1513b:359a-45: sngags pa dam tshig zad par 'gyur //
T02D1513b:359a-46: zad pas dngos grub mi 'gyur zhing //
T02D1513b:359a-47: bdud dang sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel //
T02D1513b:359a-48: de bas dam tshig bus srungs shig / ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D1513b:359a-49: slob mas kyang de bzhin du bgyid do zhes brjod do //
T02D1513b:359a-50: de nas seng ge'i khri la dar gyis g-yogs te de'i steng du bzhag la //
T02D1513b:359a-51: yi ge mngon par bzlas pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
T02D1513b:359a-52: dang ba dan bsgreng la slob ma lhar bskyed la
T02D1513b:359b-0: / pu dz'a au aa go ra de @359b ma
T02D1513b:359b-1: la sogs pa'i yi ge nye shu rtsa bzhi lus
T02D1513b:359b-2: / la bkod la / h'um ring po brgyad las
T02D1513b:359b-3: sgo mtshams ma bskyed la snying ga'i rtsa bzhi la
T02D1513b:359b-4: / la bkod la / yum bzhi dang / bdud
T02D1513b:359b-5: rtsi'i snod bzhi bskyed la dpa' bo dpa' mo'i go
T02D1513b:359b-6: / la bkod la / yum bzhi dang / cha
T02D1513b:359b-7: bskon nas / phee pheem gi phyag rgyas ye shes
T02D1513b:359b-8: sems dpa' spyan drangs la bcug ste /
T02D1513b:359b-9: gnas gsum du yi ge gsum gyi byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1513b:359b-10: de nas slob dpon gyis lha thams cad kyi rang
T02D1513b:359b-11: bzhin rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa blangs nas bkra
T02D1513b:359b-12: shis tshig su bcad pa brjod cing dbang bskur bar
T02D1513b:359b-13: bya ste / lha rnams zhu ba las ye shes
T02D1513b:359b-14: kyi bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs te spyi bor blugs
T02D1513b:359b-16: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa /
T02D1513b:359b-17: gsang ba gsum ni gnas las byung //
T02D1513b:359b-18: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D1513b:359b-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur ro //
T02D1513b:359b-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi barti ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um zhes brjod do //
T02D1513b:359b-23: me tog gi phreng ba spyi bor bcings la 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1513b:359b-24: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D1513b:359b-25: phyag rgya chen po'i byin brlabs la //
T02D1513b:359b-26: gzugs dor ba yi dam tshig gis //
T02D1513b:359b-27: gsang sngags ma tshang med par bzla //
T02D1513b:359b-28: rang rang rig pa'i ngo bo de //
T02D1513b:359b-29: phyogs bcu dus gsum bzhugs pa'o//
T02D1513b:359b-30: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1513b:359b-31: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02D1513b:359b-32: dka' thub sdom pa mi zad pa //
T02D1513b:359b-33: bsrungs na mi snang mngon shes dang //
T02D1513b:359b-34: mkha' la rgyu dang lus ngag yid //
T02D1513b:359b-36: de bas sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog /'dod pa thams cad bsten pa yis ;
T02D1513b:359b-37: chos kyi ye shes mchog bsnyes pa'o //
T02D1513b:359b-38: ba de dang sdug bsngal de dag min //
T02D1513b:359b-39: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams bsten //
T02D1513b:359b-40: ye shes don gnyer 'dod chags can //
T02D1513b:359b-41: sbyor bas bsgrubs na myur du 'grub //
T02D1513b:359b-42: sku gsung thugs kyi yang dag 'grub //
T02D1513b:359b-43: gang gzhan dman pa bshad pa yin //
T02D1513b:359b-45: sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pas so //
T02D1513b:359b-46: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gsung //
T02D1513b:359b-47: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D1513b:359b-48: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02D1513b:359b-49: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02D1513b:360a-0: de nas mig gnyis su h'um las rdo rje nas 'bras tsam dkar por bsams @360a * //
T02D1513b:360a-2: gser ram rin po che las byas pa'i mig thur
T02D1513b:360a-3: dang pra zhes bya bas mig dbye bar bya ste
T02D1513b:360a-4: / ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02D1513b:360a-5: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02D1513b:360a-6: bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i //
T02D1513b:360a-7: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02D1513b:360a-8: aom badzra ni tra aa pa ha ra ba ta
T02D1513b:360a-9: lam hr'i: zhes brjod pas ni nyon mongs pa spangs
T02D1513b:360a-10: pa'i dbang ngo // de nas me long bstan la /
T02D1513b:360a-11: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1513b:360a-12: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D1513b:360a-13: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1513b:360a-14: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02D1513b:360a-15: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02D1513b:360a-16: de ltar chos 'di shes gyis la //
T02D1513b:360a-17: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02D1513b:360a-18: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02D1513b:360a-20: de nas sku gsung thugs kyi dbang sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1513b:360a-21: aa las bskyed pa'i dril bu blangs te /
T02D1513b:360a-22: chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D1513b:360a-23: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02D1513b:360a-24: nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis //
T02D1513b:360a-25: sku mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02D1513b:360a-27: de nas chos bskyed pa'i mda' gzhu sbyin la phyogs
T02D1513b:360a-28: bzhi dang steng 'og tu ho zhes pas mda' 'phen
T02D1513b:360a-29: du gzhug go // sku'i dbang ngo //
T02D1513b:360a-30: de nas h'um las me long bskyed pa byin la /
T02D1513b:360a-31: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02D1513b:360a-32: dag cing gsal la me long bzhin //
T02D1513b:360a-33: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02D1513b:360a-34: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
T02D1513b:360a-35: po rdo rje byang chub kyi sems ni 'di yin
T02D1513b:360a-36: par shes par gyis shig / ces brjod par bya
T02D1513b:360a-38: de nas rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag la /
T02D1513b:360a-39: lag pa g-yas par dung byin te g-yon par po ti byin la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D1513b:360a-40: deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos
T02D1513b:360a-41: kyi 'khor lo skor cig / de ring phan chad
T02D1513b:360a-42: 'jig rten la // skyob pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D1513b:360a-43: chos kyi dung ni bla med pa //
T02D1513b:360a-44: ma lus kun du gang bar gyis ;
T02D1513b:360a-45: / som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02D1513b:360a-46: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02D1513b:360a-47: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'bral 'di la rab tu sgrogs //
T02D1513b:360a-48: de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas la //
T02D1513b:360a-49: phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02D1513b:360a-50: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02D1513b:360b-0: kun du srung ba @360b khyod la mdzad //
T02D1513b:360b-1: ces bya bas sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1513b:360b-2: de nas rjes su gnang pa'i dbang lnga sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1513b:360b-3: 'jig rten kun las thams cad du //
T02D1513b:360b-4: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D1513b:360b-6: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D1513b:360b-7: de bzhin du rdo rje dang khro bo dang padma
T02D1513b:360b-8: dang nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhes bya
T02D1513b:360b-9: ba'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba
T02D1513b:360b-10: lnga dbang bskur ba lnga sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1513b:360b-11: de nas slob ma la mchod pa lngas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1513b:360b-12: mgo bo la me tog sna la bdug pa mig la mar me snying gar byug pa /
T02D1513b:360b-13: yang na gnas gsum du dri'i thig le byas la /
T02D1513b:360b-14: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lha'i de nyid dang /
T02D1513b:360b-15: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid dang /
T02D1513b:360b-17: khams dang rang bzhin du lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid dang /
T02D1513b:360b-18: bsnyen pa dang sta gon dang /
T02D1513b:360b-19: dkyil 'khor dang sbyin sreg dang bum pa dang gtor ma dang bdud rtsi lnga sbyang ba dang /
T02D1513b:360b-20: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa dang bcas pa'i phrin las bzhi slob dpon gyi las rnams bslab par bya'o //
T02D1513b:360b-21: de nas yon dbul bar bya ste /
T02D1513b:360b-22: glang po rta dang shing rta nor //
T02D1513b:360b-23: nor bu byu ru la sogs pa //
T02D1513b:360b-24: yon gyi mchog ni blangs pa rnams //
T02D1513b:360b-25: phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya //
T02D1513b:360b-26: deng nas brtsams te bdag bran du //
T02D1513b:360b-27: khyod la bdag ni 'bul lags kyis //
T02D1513b:360b-29: lung bstan bya dang dbugs dbyung mdzod //
T02D1513b:360b-31: de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par bsams la
T02D1513b:360b-32: gzengs bstod pa 'di dang lung bstan par bya ste
T02D1513b:360b-33: / g-yon ba snying gar khu tshur bcangs pa dang chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02D1513b:360b-34: aom nga yis 'di ltar lung bstan te //
T02D1513b:360b-35: rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1513b:360b-36: srid pa'i mchog ni grub pa yin //
T02D1513b:360b-37: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02D1513b:360b-38: kye de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1513b:360b-40: 'di yi dbang bskur gyur pa yis //
T02D1513b:360b-41: sngags pas 'gro ba kun dang bdag / bla na med pa'i byang chub tu //
T02D1513b:360b-42: bde bar gshegs kyis lung bstan mdzod //
T02D1513b:360b-43: ngo bo nyid kyis sems can rnams //
T02D1513b:361a-2: gsang bas sems can don bya'o //
T02D1513b:361a-3: nyin re zhing ni thun sna ru //
T02D1513b:361a-4: ting 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ldan par //
T02D1513b:361a-5: gyur nas thun mong gis shes kyis //
T02D1513b:361a-6: dngos grub thob par 'gyur bar bya //
T02D1513b:361a-7: mi snang ba ni stong yin te //
T02D1513b:361a-8: mngon shes snang ba nyis stong yin //
T02D1513b:361a-9: rig pa 'dzin pa sum stong yin //
T02D1513b:361a-10: rdo rje can ni 'gro kun bdag / zhi dang rgyas sogs las gang dang //
T02D1513b:361a-11: de las gzhan pa ci 'dod pa //
T02D1513b:361a-12: 'khor lo rjes gnyis sbyor ba yis //
T02D1513b:361a-14: kun gyi gnang ba sbyin pa'o //
T02D1513b:361a-15: de nas dbugs dbyung ba bshad par bya ste //
T02D1513b:361a-17: mthong ba dang ni zhugs gyur pas //
T02D1513b:361a-18: sdig pa kun las nges grol bar //
T02D1513b:361a-19: khyed rnams de nyid legs par gnas //
T02D1513b:361a-20: bde chen theg pa 'di las ni //
T02D1513b:361a-21: slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te //
T02D1513b:361a-22: mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas //
T02D1513b:361a-23: ces kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02D1513b:361a-24: srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1513b:361a-25: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das //
T02D1513b:361a-26: srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02D1513b:361a-27: ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin //
T02D1513b:361a-28: rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya //
T02D1513b:361a-29: sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs //
T02D1513b:361a-30: dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no //
T02D1513b:361a-31: gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1513b:361a-32: sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i //
T02D1513b:361a-33: byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya //
T02D1513b:361a-34: phyag na rdo rje gang yin pa //
T02D1513b:361a-35: dam pa'i chos ni mi spang zhing //
T02D1513b:361a-36: nam yang dor bar mi bya'o //
T02D1513b:361a-37: mi shes pa'am rmongs pa yis //
T02D1513b:361a-38: tshul chen bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D1513b:361a-39: bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su //
T02D1513b:361a-40: dka' thub kyis ni ma bsrungs shing//
T02D1513b:361a-41: ci bde bar ni bde bar bsam //
T02D1513b:361a-42: 'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1513b:361a-43: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams //
T02D1513b:361a-44: nam yang yongs su mi dor zhing //
T02D1513b:361a-45: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste //
T02D1513b:361a-47: sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs sla'o //
T02D1513b:361a-48: slob dpon la ni gang smod pa //
T02D1513b:361a-49: de yis sangs rgyas kun smad pas //
T02D1513b:361a-50: rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te //
T02D1513b:361a-51: rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang //
T02D1513b:361a-52: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtse ba dang //
T02D1513b:361a-53: gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis //
T02D1513b:361a-54: bsad nas sems can dmyal ltung ste //
T02D1513b:361a-55: de bas nan tan thams cad kyis //
T02D1513b:361b-0: rdo rje slob dpon @361b blo gros che //
T02D1513b:361b-1: dge ba rab tu mi spyom bas //
T02D1513b:361b-2: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02D1513b:361b-3: bla ma la ni gus bcas yon //
T02D1513b:361b-4: rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya //
T02D1513b:361b-5: des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams //
T02D1513b:361b-7: rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung //
T02D1513b:361b-8: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02D1513b:361b-9: rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul //
T02D1513b:361b-11: de phyir sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02D1513b:361b-12: rtag tu sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1513b:361b-13: de byin bsod nams tshogs yin te //
T02D1513b:361b-14: tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D1513b:361b-15: gang phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas //
T02D1513b:361b-16: deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02D1513b:361b-17: dam tshig lha rnams kun mnyam pas //
T02D1513b:361b-18: deng khyod gyur pa the tshom med //
T02D1513b:361b-19: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pas //
T02D1513b:361b-20: kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas //
T02D1513b:361b-21: khams gsum kun gyi rgyal po che //
T02D1513b:361b-22: rgyal ba'i dbang bo bsten pa yin //
T02D1513b:361b-23: de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te //
T02D1513b:361b-24: grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs //
T02D1513b:361b-25: khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1513b:361b-26: de nyid thob par the tshom med //
T02D1513b:361b-28: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba yan lag dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1513b:361b-29: de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya ste //
T02D1513b:361b-30: skyabs med pa yi skyabs gyur pa //
T02D1513b:361b-31: mgon med pa yi mgon gyur pa //
T02D1513b:361b-32: snying rje med pa'i snying rje can //
T02D1513b:361b-33: bcom ldan bde mchog gnyis med bdag / srid pa'i gdung bas bsgoms pa las //
T02D1513b:361b-34: snying rje gsol ba'i dbang bskur gsol //
T02D1513b:361b-35: de nas slob ma la gnas gsum du bdud rtsi lnga'i thig le byas la //
T02D1513b:361b-36: sngom pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1513b:361b-37: khyod kyis srog chags bsgral bar bya //
T02D1513b:361b-38: mchog gi rdzas rnams blang bar bya //
T02D1513b:361b-39: gzhan gyi dpal la la longs spyod cing //
T02D1513b:361b-40: brdzun pa lta bu'i tshig rnams smos //
T02D1513b:361b-41: bla med dam tshig 'di rnams ni //
T02D1513b:361b-42: bu khyod kyis ni bsrung bar bya //
T02D1513b:361b-43: de nas bdag nyid dpal he ru ka'i nga rgyal
T02D1513b:361b-44: gyis gnas pas las kyi phyag rgya'am chos kyi phyag
T02D1513b:361b-45: rgyal nas nyi shu rtsa bzhi la yi ger bkod
T02D1513b:361b-46: nas / dpa' bo dang dpa' mo byin gyis brlabs te bskyed la /
T02D1513b:361b-47: sgo brgyad du mkha' 'gro ma brgyad bkod nas /
T02D1513b:361b-48: snying ga'i rtsa bzhi la yum bzhir byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D1513b:361b-49: hr'i: las padmar bskyed la gnas gsum du byin gyis brlabs gnas /
T02D1513b:362a-1: las ling ga rdo rjer bskyed la /
T02D1513b:362a-2: nor bu'i mtshams a'a: las byang chub sems phab nas
T02D1513b:362a-3: 'khor lo bzhi'i rang bzhin du bsgoms la dga' ba
T02D1513b:362a-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga
T02D1513b:362a-6: na badzra sv'a bha ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod
T02D1513b:362a-7: la thig le gsum pa padma'i nang du phab la
T02D1513b:362a-8: thod pa'i nang du bzhag ste //
T02D1513b:362a-9: som sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva
T02D1513b:362a-10: bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod la ye shes
T02D1513b:362a-11: lnga'i 'od zer slob ma'i lce la gzhag par bya'o
T02D1513b:362a-12: // de nas slob ma'i lkog mar hr'i: las padma
T02D1513b:362a-13: 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la lce'i padma'i cha ba
T02D1513b:362a-14: h'um las rdo rje bskyed la rtse mo'i dbus kyi
T02D1513b:362a-18: sangs rgyas zhu ba'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1513b:362a-19: khams lnga dag dang yang dag 'dres //
T02D1513b:362a-20: gsang ba yi ni dbang bskur ro //
T02D1513b:362a-21: de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar bya ste gsol ba gdab pa ni /
T02D1513b:362a-22: 'khor lo bzhi yi rang bzhin can//
T02D1513b:362a-23: ye shes bzhi yi rang bzhin sku //
T02D1513b:362a-24: dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin mchog / bde ba chen bo'i dbang bskur gsol //
T02D1513b:362a-25: de nas 'di skad ces brjod bar bya ste //
T02D1513b:362a-26: bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang //
T02D1513b:362a-27: dmangs rigs mthar gnas shes rab kun //
T02D1513b:362a-28: gus dang bcas pas mchod pa dang //
T02D1513b:362a-29: gnyis med tshul dang 'o byed par //
T02D1513b:362a-30: dpa' bo chen po spro gyur tam //
T02D1513b:362a-31: smos shig dpa' bo bde ba che //
T02D1513b:362a-32: ci gsung dam tshig bsten par gyis //
T02D1513b:362a-33: lha mo bdag gis byed par nus //
T02D1513b:362a-34: padma kha bye byas nas ni //
T02D1513b:362a-35: skra grol gcer bur gnas pa yis //
T02D1513b:362a-36: rdo rje bzhad pa gar byed pa //
T02D1513b:362a-37: me tog chu ldan dpa' bo yis //
T02D1513b:362a-38: rnal 'byor ma la rdo rje yis //
T02D1513b:362a-39: deng nas brtsams te bu khyod kyis //
T02D1513b:362a-40: brtul zhugs bzang pos 'gro don gyis /
T02D1513b:362a-42: de nas 'di skad ces sngom pa dbog par bya ste /
T02D1513b:362a-43: gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la //
T02D1513b:362a-44: mi bya ba ni ci yang med //
T02D1513b:362a-45: tshangs par spyod pa brtan mnos la //
T02D1513b:362a-46: 'dod pa lnga ni spyad par gyis //
T02D1513b:362a-47: gnyis med la gnas zas la ni //
T02D1513b:362a-48: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs brda //
T02D1513b:362a-49: lha mo gzhan dang kun sbyor ba //
T02D1513b:362a-50: 'dod pa chags par gyur pa dang //
T02D1513b:362a-51: gnyis su med thogs med pa'o //
T02D1513b:362a-52: dam tshig spyod dang spyad pa dang //
T02D1513b:362a-53: bud med dbang phyug shin tu tshor //
T02D1513b:362b-0: @362b tshangs spyod de bzhin rnam bzhi yi //
T02D1513b:362b-1: khro med rgyun gyi kun spyod pa //
T02D1513b:362b-2: sgrub pa po yis yongs su bsrungs //
T02D1513b:362b-3: rtag tu sgrub pa la gnas nas //
T02D1513b:362b-4: yul kun la ni rnam grol zhing //
T02D1513b:362b-5: gnyis med grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1513b:362b-6: mi bsten srid pa deng khyod kyi //
T02D1513b:362b-7: bu khyod kyis ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D1513b:362b-8: de ltar sdom pa byin nas phyag rgya rnam pa
T02D1513b:362b-9: bzhi'i bye brag gis dbang bskur ba rnam pa bzhir
T02D1513b:362b-10: 'gyur te / chags pa'i lam la dge bsnyen gyi
T02D1513b:362b-11: sngom pa dang ldan pa'i khyim pa'i byang chub sems
T02D1513b:362b-12: dpa' nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ma bral bas /
T02D1513b:362b-13: las kyi phyag rgya rigs can ma bzhi dang /
T02D1513b:362b-15: las dang ldan pa bzhi ste bcu gnyis la /
T02D1513b:362b-16: gzugs bzang yan lag ma nyams dang //
T02D1513b:362b-17: rgyan ni kun gyis brgyan pa dang //
T02D1513b:362b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i yon tan
T02D1513b:362b-19: dang ldan pa la bskyed pa'i rim pa la bsnyen
T02D1513b:362b-20: sgrub bzhi'i rim pa dang ldan pa'i lha mor bskyed
T02D1513b:362b-21: la / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'i rim pa rgyud kyi rim pa dang /
T02D1513b:362b-22: tsanda l'i sngags kyi rim pa dang /
T02D1513b:362b-23: byang chub kyi sems phab pa'i ye shes kyi rim pas dga' ba bzhi bskyed la /
T02D1513b:362b-25: rka na la lce sbyar rgyun bzlog pas //
T02D1513b:362b-26: lha dang lha min bsdigs nas ni //
T02D1513b:362b-27: gnyis med lhan cig skyes dga' bsgom ;
T02D1513b:362b-29: yang na grol pa'i lam la dge slong dang dge tshul lam /
T02D1513b:362b-30: rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi phyag rgya'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i lha mo'am /
T02D1513b:362b-32: dam tshig gi phyag rgyar rtsa'i 'khor lo'am /
T02D1513b:362b-33: rlung dbus ma las gtum mo drod kyi rim pa
T02D1513b:362b-34: las bde ba byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas rlung
T02D1513b:362b-36: ye ge'i 'khrul 'khor gyi dga' bral gyis gnas nas
T02D1513b:362b-37: bzlog / de nas bsgom du gzhug ste gtum mo
T02D1513b:362b-39: lhan cig skyes dga'i man ngag ni //
T02D1513b:362b-40: ri bong 'dzin dang bzlog pa'i mthar //
T02D1513b:362b-41: du ba smig rgyu'i rtags ldan pas //
T02D1513b:362b-42: de las gzungs ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D1513b:362b-43: zhes bya ba'i tshig dbang rin po che nyid slob ma la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1513b:362b-45: 'dod chags bral blta bu'i sdig / khams gsum na ni gzhan med de //
T02D1513b:362b-46: de bas 'dod la chags bral bar //
T02D1513b:363a-0: khyod ni nam yang ma byed cig / ces @363a * //
T02D1513b:363a-1: brjod la dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o //
T02D1513b:363a-2: yang na bdag byin gyis brlab ba'i lam pas ni
T02D1513b:363a-3: phyag rgya chen po stong pa nyid la ril por
T02D1513b:363a-4: 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhug pa'i man ngag gis
T02D1513b:363a-5: bsgom ste / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1513b:363a-6: bde ba chen po'i ngang la 'bad rtsol bral ba'i
T02D1513b:363a-7: blos lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings la gnas pas rgyud
T02D1513b:363a-8: dang sngags dang ye shes kyi rim pa spangs pa
T02D1513b:363a-9: gsang ba'i rim pa 'ba' zhig la brten nas /
T02D1513b:363a-12: rtsa aa ba dh'u t'i dang /
T02D1513b:363a-14: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ste de rnams ni mtshon byed byang chub kyi sems so ;
T02D1513b:363a-15: / mtshon bya don gyi byang chub kyi sems ni zung 'jug bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T02D1513b:363a-16: thabs bde ba chen po zung 'jug rtog pa dang
T02D1513b:363a-17: bral bas 'bras bu gnyis su med pa zung 'jug
T02D1513b:363a-18: bde ba chen po lhun gyis grub pa 'byung bar
T02D1513b:363a-19: 'gyur ro // bcos ma'i lam mtshan ma dang bcas pa rnam par spangs nas /
T02D1513b:363a-20: ma bcos pa mtshan ma med pa bdag byin gyis
T02D1513b:363a-21: brlab pa'i slob ma la brtan pa shes rab ye
T02D1513b:363a-22: shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
T02D1513b:363a-23: tshig dbang rin po che gnyis pa'o //
T02D1513b:363a-25: dper na pha rol don gnyer 'ga' //
T02D1513b:363a-26: gzings la brten nas 'gro byed pa //
T02D1513b:363a-27: pha rol phyin nas dor bar byed //
T02D1513b:363a-28: bcos ma'i lam yang de bzhin no //
T02D1513b:363a-30: de nas rig pa'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1513b:363a-31: don dam par chos kyi dbyings bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin dmigs la /
T02D1513b:363a-32: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lha'i de khon nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1513b:363a-33: 'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas lnga bdag nyid //
T02D1513b:363a-34: gar mkhan dang ni sangs rgyas bzang ltar snang //
T02D1513b:363a-35: gang du bde chen zhes bya gcig pu nyid //
T02D1513b:363a-36: gcig pu nyams kyis du ma'i gar yang mdzad //
T02D1513b:363a-37: nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1513b:363a-38: rnal 'byor ma ni mtshan mor bshad //
T02D1513b:363a-39: sprul pa las byung dpa' bo rnams //
T02D1513b:363a-40: yan lag drug cu sems kyis sprul //
T02D1513b:363a-41: dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa ni //
T02D1513b:363a-42: padma'i gzugs su sprul pa yin //
T02D1513b:363a-43: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1513b:363a-44: he ni rgyu la sogs pa nyid //
T02D1513b:363a-45: ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba //
T02D1513b:363a-46: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o //
T02D1513b:363a-47: sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1513b:363a-48: mya ngan 'das la mi bstan to //
T02D1513b:363b-0: h'um las cho ga @363b bskyed nas mtshams kyi sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1513b:363b-1: de nas me tog gtor la rkang pa brgyad pas bstod nas slob ma ldang bar bya'o //
T02D1513b:363b-2: chu dang dbu rgyan cod pan dang //
T02D1513b:363b-3: rdo rje dril bu ming lnga ni //
T02D1513b:363b-4: rig pa'i dbang ste dang po yin //
T02D1513b:363b-5: rdo rje brtul zhugs phyag mtshan sngags //
T02D1513b:363b-6: gar dang phreng ba glu dang ni//
T02D1513b:363b-7: dri dang spos dang mar me ste //
T02D1513b:363b-8: brtul zhugs dgu po 'di dag ni //
T02D1513b:363b-9: rig pa 'dzin pa'i yan lag yin //
T02D1513b:363b-10: brtul zhugs mang po gnyis pa'o //
T02D1513b:363b-12: mi ldog dbang bskur gsum pa'o //
T02D1513b:363b-13: spang pa dang ni ye shes dang //
